#apiToken.title: Personal access token
#apiToken.description: The personal access token granting the authorization to the API. A token can be created in CJ Developer Portal.

advOrPub.title: Advertiser or publisher
advOrPub.description: Choose whether to use "advertiserCommission" endpoint or "publisherCommissions" endpoint.

entityId.title: Entity IDs
entityId.description: IDs of entities, for which to download commission

recordsQuery.title: Query
recordsQuery.description: A valid records query that will be sent to CJ's API. Refer to CJ's Developer portal for valid query fields and correct specification.

dateFrom.title: Start date
dateFrom.description:
Lower boundary of the date window, for which the commissions should be downloaded.
Accepted values:
  • "yesterday" - sets parameter to yesterday's date,
  • "X day(s) ago" - sets parameter to relative date from today,
  • absolute date in format YYYY-MM-DD.

dateTo.title: End date
dateTo.description:
Upper boundary of the date window, for which the commissions should be downloaded.
Accepted values:
  • "now", "today" or blank - sets parameter to today's date,
  • "yesterday" - sets parameter to yesterday's date,
  • "X day(s) ago" - sets parameter to relative date from today,
  • absolute date in format YYYY-MM-DD.

incremental.title: Incremental load
incremental.description: If set to "true", incremental load will be utilized. Otherwise, full load to storage is performed.
